pages.text: $(l)Wooden Crate$() is a block that $(3)generates on the Wooden Crate Structures $(l:new_content/structures/wooden_crate_small)(1)$() $(l:new_content/structures/wooden_crate_large)(2)$() and can be fished 1 to 2 crates on all biomes. $(br2)When broken without Silk Touch, you can get a random drop from this list:

♦ Drops ♦ $(br)1 Sapling (11,7%) $(br)1 Log (11,7%) $(br)1-4 Coal (11,7%) $(br)1-3 Bread (11,7%) $(br)1-4 Stick (11,7%) $(br)1-8 Cobblestone (11,7%) $(br)1 Apple (8,8%) $(br)1-2 $(l:new_content/items/normal_items/leather_armor_piece)Leather Armor Piece$() (8,8%) $(br)1 $(l:new_content/items/normal_items/golden_armor_scrap)Golden Armor Scrap$() (5,9%) $(br)1 Stone Pickaxe (5,9%)
